content.raw: Is it possible to log only a subset of the information generated by Gazebo in the log? Let's say I have a complex robot with multiple DOFs and sensors but I'm only interested in the images generated by one camera and its position in the world. Maybe this might be interesting for avoiding the creation of a big log file with a lot of information that the user is not going to use.
